alert.note: Alert for San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 13 at 12:11PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands and Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
